QuestData.Title: Improvised Implements
QuestData.Description:
There must be some way we can get ourselves out of these cells.
I don't see anything I can use over here. Search your cell for anything that can facilitate our escape.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search your cell for something that can be used to escape.
QuestData.RewardText:
You are more resourceful than I thought, $c!
Just a quick incantation, and we're on our way to freedom!

Objectives.Objective: Find something to help you escape
